REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring that genetically modified salmon that is sold or offered for sale be labeled
Summary: Relates to requiring genetically modified salmon that is sold or offered for sale be labeled.
LawCode: Add ยง1356, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring that genetically modified salmon that is sold or offered for sale be labeled
